head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths TENNEY, LILLIAN BAUM, M.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths TENNEY, LILLIAN BAUM, M.D.

block.p: TENNEY--Lillian Baum, M.D. The memorial service for Dr. Lillian Baum Tenney, M.D., originally scheduled for March 17th, has been rescheduled for Saturday April 14th, 3:00 pm, at the Princeton University Chapel. A reception at Prospect House will immediately follow. Contributions in the name of Dr. Tenney may be made to Doctors without Borders.

TENNEY--Lillian Baum, M.D. The memorial service for Dr. Lillian Baum Tenney, M.D., originally scheduled for March 17th, has been rescheduled for Saturday April 14th, 3:00 pm, at the Princeton University Chapel. A reception at Prospect House will immediately follow. Contributions in the name of Dr. Tenney may be made to Doctors without Borders.
